commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.actived=1..}] run effect give @s minecraft:luck 3 255 true
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.actived=1..}] run effect give @s minecraft:jump_boost 1 255 true
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.actived=1..}] run effect give @s minecraft:dolphins_grace 1 255 true
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.mask 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.mask

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=1}] run tag @s add energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run tag @s remove energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.arms.set

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=1}] run tag @s add hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run tag @s remove hand.uni.beam
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.or.energy.beam

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.flight.set

first_tick_commands: execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal
